page.title: 12Football and Cricket Clubs
page.content: Most of the football matches are play- ed on Saturday or Sunday. They do not play in the summer. If they lose a game it is only by the odd goal. When I watch they mostly win. They have a practice every Tuesday from 7pm to 9.30pm. First they run around, then exercise and then they just have a game. They are going to have two teams and two managers. The oldest player is 35 and the youngest ones are 17. There are 22 members of the Cricket Club which meets at the village playing field and was started in 1984. A groundsman is responsible for looking after the wicket with the help of club members. There are about 30 matches in a season. Up to July 7th 1985 the highest individual score has been 164 runs. Wednesday is Club practice night and Tuesday is practice for 7-13 year olds.
